node.nodeDescription: Harvest your enemies with a spectral scythe.

nodeList.altText: Minions can have multiple instances of this buff at once.
nodeList.description: Harvest hits grant Skull Stacks. Skull Stacks are automatically consumed when you reach 6 stacks to make your next Harvest Hit and your minions deal more damage.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Gain a skull stack if Harvest hits an enemy. When you have 6 skull stacks, your next harvest consumes all the stacks to deal [60%] increased damage per point and grant your minions [60%] increased damage per point for 3 seconds.

nodeList.description: Harvest hits leave a trace on enemies, causing enemies to take increased damage and be prioritized by your minions. Traces last for 5 seconds.

nodeList.nodeDescription: Blood wraiths summoned with Harvest have [100%] increased critical strike chance per point

node.altText: {Blood Wraith}s have a base of 100 health, decay over time, and use melee attacks.
node.description: Harvest has a chance to summon a {Blood Wraith} when it kills an enemy. You cannot summon more than one Blood Wraith every 2 seconds.
